00038                 private function reinit()
00039                 {
00040                         // load global config file or die
00041                         if (!file_exists("./config.controller.php"))
00042                                 {
00043                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' not found!");
00044                                 }
00045                         else if (!__check_syntax("./config.controller.php"))
00046                                 {
00047                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' is invalid!");
00048                                 }
00049                         else
00050                                 {
00051                                         __session_start();
00052                                         include("./config.controller.php");
00053                                         $_SESSION["_Action"]         = "";
00054                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"]         = "";
00055                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]          = "";
00056                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "";
00057                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"]    = "";
00058                                         $_SESSION["_SqlType"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][0])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][0] : false;
00059                                         $_SESSION["_TimeOut"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][1])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][1] : 300;
00060                                         $_SESSION["_Cookies"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][2])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][2] : false;
00061                                         $_SESSION["_Webmaster"]      = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][3] : "webmaster@localhost";
00062                                         $_SESSION["_Domain"]         = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][4])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][4] : "localhost";
00063                                         $_SESSION["_MaxWorkingH"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][5])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][5] : 8;
00064                                         $_SESSION["_TplSqlTable"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Template"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Template"][3] : false;
00065                                 }
00066                                 
00067                         // try to register needed objects for current session or die
00068                         try
00069                                 {
00070                                         $this->register("Memory",array(),"MEMORY");
00071                                         
00072                                         $this->register("Timer",array("Controller",true),"TIMER.PHP");
00073                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->reset();
00074                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->start();
00075                                         
00076                                         $this->register("MySql", $_SETTINGS["MySql"], "MYSQL");
00077                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.MYSQL"]->reset();
00078                                         
00079                                         $this->register("Template", $_SETTINGS["Template"], "HTML");
00080                                         $this->register("Session",  array(), "CLIENT");
00081                                 }
00082                         catch (Exception $e)
00083                                 {
00084                                         die($e->getMessage());
00085                                 }
00086                 }

00110                 protected function register($classname, $parameters = array(), $alias = "")
00111                 {
00112                         if ($alias != "" && ! isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00113                                 {
00114                                         $_SESSION[$alias] =& new $classname($parameters);
00115                                 }
00116                         else if (! isset($_SESSION[$classname]) && $alias == "")
00117                                 {
00118                                         $_SESSION[$classname] =& new $classname($parameters);
00119                                 }
00120                 }
00121                 
00132                 protected function unregister($classname, $alias = "")
00133                 {
00134                         if (isset($_SESSION[$classname]))
00135                                 {
00136                                         unset($_SESSION[$classname]);
00137                                 }
00138                         if ($alias != "" && isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00139                                 {
00140                                         unset($_SESSION[$alias]);
00141                                 }
00142                 }

00165                 public function create_menu()
00166                 {
00167                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00168                                 {
00169                                         // no menu for guests!!
00170                                         return;
00171                                 }
00172                                 
00173                         $is_users = false;
00174                         $is_home  = false;
00175                         $is_setup = false;
00176                         
00177                         switch ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"])
00178                                 {
00179                                 case "setup":
00180                                         $is_setup = true;
00181                                         break;
00182                                 case "users":
00183                                 case "details":
00184                                         $is_users = true;
00185                                         break;
00186                                 case "home":
00187                                 default:
00188                                         $is_home = true;
00189                                         break;
00190                                 }
00191                                 
00192                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Abmelden", "./?action=logout", "Q");
00193                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00194                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("&Uuml;bersicht", "./?page=home", "H", $is_home);
00195                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Mitarbeiter", "./?page=users", "E", $is_users);
00196                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Einstellungen", "./?page=setup", "S", $is_setup);
00197                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00198                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>KOMMEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=1", "K");
00199                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>GEHEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=0", "G");
00200                 }

00209                 public function create_page()
00210                 {
00211                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00212                                 {
00213                                         if ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"] == "passwd")
00214                                                 {
00215                                                         // load template
00216                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("passwd.html");
00217                                                         // send page to browser
00218                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("passwd.html");
00219                                                 }
00220                                         else
00221                                                 {
00222                                                         // load template
00223                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("login.html");
00224                                                         // send page to browser
00225                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("login.html");
00226                                                 }
00227                                 }
00228                         else
00229                                 {
00230                                         switch ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"])
00231                                                 {
00232                                                 case "users":
00233                                                         $this->show_user_table();
00234                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("users.html");
00235                                                         break;
00236                                                 case "details":
00237                                                         $this->show_user_details();
00238                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("details.html");
00239                                                         break;
00240                                                 case "setup":
00241                                                         $select = array("-1" => "");
00242                                                         $edit   = array("name1" => "", "name2" => "", "pass" => "");
00243                                                         
00244                                                         $query  = "SELECT mid, email FROM tr_users ORDER BY email;";
00245                                                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00246                                                         
00247                                                         // reformat array for creating select menu
00248                                                         foreach($array as $key => $value)
00249                                                         {
00250                                                                 $select[$value["mid"]] = $value["email"];
00251                                                         }
00252                                                         
00253                                                         // check for selected item
00254                                                         $selected = "";
00255                                                         if (isset($_POST["edit_mid"]))
00256                                                                 {
00257                                                                         $selected = $_POST["edit_mid"];
00258                                                                         if ($_POST["submit"] == "LADEN")
00259                                                                                 {
00260                                                                                         $query  = "SELECT * FROM tr_users WHERE mid='$selected';";
00261                                                                                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00262                                                                                         $edit["name1"] = $array[0]["firstname"];
00263                                                                                         $edit["name2"] = $array[0]["lastname"];
00264                                                                                 }
00265                                                                         else if ($_POST["submit"] == "SPEICHERN")
00266                                                                                 {
00267                                                                                 
00268                                                                                 }
00269                                                                 }
00270                                                                 
00271                                                         $options = $_SESSION["HTML"]->create_select($select, $selected);
00272                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_FIRSTNAME}}", $edit["name1"]);
00273                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_LASTNAME}}",  $edit["name2"]);
00274                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_PASSWORD}}",  $edit["pass"]);
00275                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "<!--USER_SELECT-->", $options);
00276                                                         
00277                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("setup.html");
00278                                                         break;
00279                                                 case "home":
00280                                                 default:
00281                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--MID-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]);
00282                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--FIRST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["firstname"]);
00283                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--LAST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["lastname"]);

00287                                                         
00288                                                         // list last bookings
00289                                                         $this->show_last_bookings();
00290                                                         
00291                                                         // summary calculation and assignment for current week and month
00292                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("WEEK");
00293                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_WEEK_NOW-->",$array["Stunden"]);

00300                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("WEEK", 1);

00306

00310                                                 }

00330                 
00344                 protected function get_booking_sums($range = "DAY", $offset = 0, $limit = 1)
00345                 {
00346                         $group = "";
00347                         $start = "";
00348                         $stop  = "";
00349                         $redat = "";
00350                         switch (strtoupper($range))
00351                                 {
00352                                 case "YEAR":
00353                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset YEAR )";
00354                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '01.01.%Y' )";
00355                                         $stop  = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '31.12.%Y' )";
00356                                         $group = "%Y";
00357                                         $range = "SameYear";
00358                                         break;
00359                                 case "MONTH":
00360                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset MONTH )";
00361                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '%Y-%m-01' )";
00362                                         $stop  = "LAST_DAY( $redat )";
00363                                         $group = "%m";
00364                                         $range = "SameMonth";
00365                                         break;
00366                                 case "WEEK":
00367                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset WEEK )";
00368                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 2 DAY )";
00369                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 8 DAY )";
00370                                         $group = "%u";
00371                                         $range = "SameWeek";
00372                                         break;
00373                                 case "DAY":
00374                                 default:
00375                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00376                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00377                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00378                                         $group = "%j";
00379                                         $range = "SameDay";
00380                                         break;
00381                                 }
00382                                 
00383                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '$group' ) AS $range, ";
00384                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $start , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Von, ";
00385                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $stop , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Bis, ";
00386                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( IFNULL( SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ), 0 ) ) as Stunden, ";
00387                         $query .= "IF( bookid = NULL, 0, COUNT( bookid ) ) AS Besuche FROM tr_bookings ";
00388                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' AND ";
00389                         $query .= "DATE( stamp_1 ) >= DATE( $start ) AND DATE( stamp_1 ) <= DATE( $stop );";
00390                         
00391                         $array = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00392                         
00393                         // future use, if multiple row read implemented
00394                         if ($limit > 1)
00395                                 {
00396                                         return $array;
00397                                 }
00398                                 
00399                         return $array[0];
00400                 }
00401                 
00413                 protected function show_last_bookings($limit=10)
00414                 {
00415                         $this->set_table_order("last_bookings", array("stamp_1", "Gekommen", "Gegangen", "Anwesend"), 10);
00416                         
00417                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( stamp_1 ) AS total FROM tr_bookings ";
00418                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' GROUP BY mid;";
00419                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00420                         
00421                         $plink = new PageLink("last_bookings", $entry["total"]);
00422                         
00423                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Datum, ";
00424                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gekommen, ";
00425                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_2, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gegangen, ";
00426                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ) AS Anwesend ";
00427                         $query .= "FROM tr_bookings ";
00428                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' ";
00429                         $query .= "ORDER BY ".$_SESSION["_OrderBy"]["last_bookings"]." ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00430                         
00431                         $book = $this->query2table($query,"last_bookings",array(),false,true);
00432                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_DATA-->",$book);
00433                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00434                 }
00435                 
00443                 protected function show_user_table($limit=10)
00444                 {
00445                         $this->set_table_order("user_table", array("mid", "email", "firstname", "lastname", "groupname"), 0);
00446                         
00447                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( email ) AS total FROM tr_users;";
00448                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00449                         
00450                         $plink = new PageLink("user_table", $entry["total"]);
00451                         
00452                         $query  = "SELECT u.mid AS MID, u.email AS Email, ";
00453                         $query .= "u.firstname AS Vorname, u.lastname AS Nachname, g.groupname AS Gruppe ";
00454                         $query .= "FROM tr_users u ";
00455                         $query .= "LEFT JOIN tr_groups g USING ( gid ) ";
00456                         $query .= "GROUP BY mid ";
00457                         $query .= "ORDER BY ".$_SESSION["_OrderBy"]["user_table"]." ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00458                         
00459                         $users = $this->query2table($query,"user_table", array(60, 290, 200, 200), true, true);
00460                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_TABLE-->",$users);
00461                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00462                 }

00471                 public function show_user_details()
00472                 {
00473                         if (! isset($_GET["id"]))
00474                                 {
00475                                         throw new Exception("Sie haben keine Benutzer-ID angegeben!",999);
00476                                 }
00477                         else if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin())
00478                                 {
00479                                         throw new Exception("Sie sind kein Administrator!",998);
00480                                 }
00481                                 
00482                         $mid = intval($_GET["id"]);
00483                         
00484                         $query    = "SELECT firstname, lastname FROM tr_users WHERE mid = '$mid';";
00485                         $details  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00486                         
00487                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Datum, ";
00488                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( IFNULL( SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ), 0 ) ) as 'Stunden anwesend', ";
00489                         $query .= "IF( bookid = NULL, 0, COUNT( bookid ) ) AS 'Anzahl Buchungen' ";
00490                         $query .= "FROM tr_bookings ";
00491                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '$mid' GROUP BY Datum ORDER BY Datum ASC";
00492                         
00493                         $content = $this->query2table($query,"booking_details");
00494                         
00495                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--FIRST_NAME-->",$details["firstname"]);
00496                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--LAST_NAME-->", $details["lastname"]);
00497                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--DETAILS-->",   $content);
00498                 }

00511                 protected function set_table_order($tableid, $ordervalues, $default = 0)
00512                 {
00513                         if (! is_array($_SESSION["_OrderBy"]) || ! is_array($_SESSION["_OrderID"]))
00514                                 {
00515                                         $_SESSION["_OrderID"] = array();
00516                                         $_SESSION["_OrderBy"] = array();
00517                                 }
00518                                 
00519                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_OrderBy"][$tableid]) || isset($_GET["order"]))
00520                                 {
00521                                         $_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid] = (isset($_GET["order"]))?(intval($_GET["order"])-10):($default-10);
00522                                         $direc = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]>=0)?"DESC":"ASC";
00523                                         $order = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]<0)?($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]+10):$_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid];
00524                                         
00525                                         if (isset($ordervalues[$order]))
00526                                                 {
00527                                                         $order = $ordervalues[$order];
00528                                                 }
00529                                         else
00530                                                 {
00531                                                         $order = $ordervalues[0];
00532                                                 }
00533                                         $_SESSION["_OrderBy"][$tableid] = "$order $direc";
00534                                 }
00535                 }
00536                 
00549                 protected function query2table($query,$id,$width = array(),$details = false, $orderon = false)
00550                 {
00551                         $details = $details && $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin();
00552                         $result  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00553                         $first   = true;
00554                         $dump    = "<table id=\"$id\">";
00555                         while ($row = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->fetch_array($result))
00556                                 {
00557                                         // append only keys on first line
00558                                         if ($first)
00559                                                 {
00560                                                         $dump .= "<tr>";
00561                                                         $sid   = "";
00562                                                         
00563                                                         if (ini_get("session.use_cookies") != "1")
00564                                                                 {
00565                                                                         $sid = "&amp;".ini_get("session.name")."=".session_id();
00566                                                                 }
00567                                                                 
00568                                                         foreach(array_keys($row) as $key => $value)
00569                                                         {
00570                                                                 $td_width = "";
00571                                                                 
00572                                                                 // correct width if set (in pixels)
00573                                                                 if (isset($width[$key]))
00574                                                                         {
00575                                                                                 $td_width = " style=\"width:".$width[$key]."px;\"";
00576                                                                         }
00577                                                                         
00578                                                                 $dump .= "<td{$td_width}><b>";
00579                                                                 
00580                                                                 if ($orderon)
00581                                                                         {
00582                                                                                 $order = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id]<0)?($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id]+10):$_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id];
00583                                                                                 $arrow_up = "";
00584                                                                                 $arrow_dn = "";
00585                                                                                 
00586                                                                                 // highlight active buttons
00587                                                                                 if ($order == $key)
00588                                                                                         {
00589                                                                                                 if ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id] < 0)
00590                                                                                                         $arrow_up = "_active";
00591                                                                                                 else
00592                                                                                                         $arrow_dn = "_active";
00593                                                                                         }
00594                                                                                         
00595                                                                                 $dump .= "<a href=\"./?page=".$_SESSION["_PageID.current"]."&amp;order=".$key.$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/order_arrow_up{$arrow_up}.png\" alt=\"aufsteigend nach $value sortiert\" title=\"aufsteigend nach $value sortiert\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a>&nbsp;";
00596                                                                                 $dump .= "<a href=\"./?page=".$_SESSION["_PageID.current"]."&amp;order=".($key+10).$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/order_arrow_down{$arrow_dn}.png\" alt=\"absteigend nach $value sortiert\" title=\"absteigend nach $value sortiert\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a>&nbsp;";
00597                                                                         }
00598                                                                 $dump .= $value;
00599                                                                 $dump .= "</b></td>";
00600                                                         }
00601                                                         
00602                                                         if ($details)
00603                                                                 {
00604                                                                         $dump .= "<td>&nbsp;</td>";
00605                                                                 }
00606                                                                 
00607                                                         $dump .= "</tr>";
00608                                                         $first = false;
00609                                                 }
00610                                         // append data rows
00611                                         $dump .= "<tr><td>";
00612                                         
00613                                         $dump .= implode("</td><td>", $row);
00614                                         
00615                                         if ($details)
00616                                                 {
00617                                                         $dump .= "<td><a href=\"./?page=details&amp;id=".$row["MID"].$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/more_infos.png\" alt=\"Details zu ".$row["Vorname"]." ".$row["Nachname"]."\" title=\"Details zu ".$row["Vorname"]." ".$row["Nachname"]."\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a></td>";
00618                                                 }
00619                                                 
00620                                         $dump .= "</td></tr>";
00621                                 }
00622                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->free_result($result);
00623                         if ($first) $dump .= "<tr><td>keine Eintr&auml;ge gefunden...</td></tr>";
00624                         // close table
00625                         $dump  .= "</table>";
00626                         return $dump;
00627                 }
00628                 
00636                 public function prepare_actions()
00637                 {
00638                         // clean previous errors
00639                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] = "";
00640                         
00641                         // save post or get value from "page"
00642                         if (isset($_POST["page"]))
00643                                 {
00644                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00645                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_POST["page"];
00646                                 }
00647                         else if (isset($_GET["page"]))
00648                                 {
00649                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00650                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_GET["page"];
00651                                 }
00652                         else
00653                                 {
00654                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "home";
00655                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = "home";
00656                                 }
00657                                 
00658                         // save post or get value from "action"
00659                         if (isset($_POST["action"]))
00660                                 {
00661                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_POST["action"];
00662                                 }
00663                         else if (isset($_GET["action"]))
00664                                 {
00665                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_GET["action"];
00666                                 }
00667                         else
00668                                 {
00669                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = "";
00670                                 }
00671                                 
00672                         // extend session of user, if valid
00673                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->extend();
00674                         
00675                         // try to execute session actions
00676                         try
00677                                 {
00678                                         switch ($_SESSION["_Action"])
00679                                                 {
00680                                                 case "login":
00681                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->login();
00682                                                         break;
00683                                                 case "logout":
00684                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->logout();
00685                                                         break;
00686                                                 case "book":
00687                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->book();
00688                                                         break;
00689                                                 case "update":
00690                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->update();
00691                                                         break;
00692                                                 case "delete":
00693                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->delete();
00694                                                         break;
00695                                                 case "create":
00696                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->create();
00697                                                         break;
00698                                                 case "passwd":
00699                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->passwd();
00700                                                         break;
00701                                                 }
00702                                 }
00703                         catch (Exception $e)
00704                                 {
00705                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] .= $e->getMessage();
00706                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]   = $e->getCode();
00707                                 }
00708                 }
00709                 
00710         }
00711 
00712 ?>
